alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:07PM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Future trends in the forecast may warrant an upgrade to a High Wind Warning, especially for areas roughly along and west of I-71.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
